title: Texas Six Flags Roller Coaster to Break Six World Records
summary: The upcoming Tormenta coaster coming to Six Flags Over Texas marks the latest in the race to create extreme theme park thrills amid the company's slumping attendance.

title: Cat Stevens Postpones Book Tour Over Visa Issues: “We Held Out as Long as We Could”
summary: "I am really upset! Not least for my fans who have bought tickets and made travel plans to see me perform," the singer wrote.
